name: BitMart 4th Anniversary Limited NFT - Type C
description:
This program rewards our most active loyal community members and new members to celebrate BitMart's 4th Anniversary. 415 limited NFT to be claimed. Tpye C - Bitmian NFT supply is 100.
 
Complete these tasks to be eligible for the claim:

Three Tasks:
1) Follow BitMart on [Twitter](url) and [Telegram ](https://t.me/BitmartExchange)
2) Register BitMart Account [Here](https://www.bitmart.com/en?r=operations)
3) Users have traded on BitMart spot market with accumulated volumes (buy + sell volume) no less than 1,000 worth of USDT from 2022/03/01 10:00 AM EST to 2022/03/29 10:00 AM EST
4) Fill out the form [here](https://forms.gle/VEmynd7wK4jDXZRMA)
